alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 2:23PM CDT until April 14 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Cottonwood and Murray Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. .River rises will continue to be experienced due to snow melt. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca. * WHEN...From this evening to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 1425.0 feet, the lower pasture and farm land begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1425.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 1425.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 1425.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat W Fk Des Moines River Avoca 1425.0 1425.0 Wed 1 pm 1424. 1424. 1424. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 430 PM CDT.
